body:
Running `make bazel-build` (on master), gives the error `ln: failed to create symbolic link '/tmp/gopath/src/k8s.io/kubernetes': File exists`:


```
export GOPATH=/tmp/gopath
export GO_WORKSPACE=${GOPATH}/src/k8s.io/kubernetes
mkdir -p ${GO_WORKSPACE%/*}
ln -s $(pwd)/ ${GO_WORKSPACE}
if [[ ! -e ${GO_WORKSPACE}/external ]]; then ln -s $(p...' failed: bash failed: error executing command 
  (exec env - \
    GOARCH=amd64 \
    GOOS=linux \
    GOROOT=/home/justinsb/.cache/bazel/_bazel_justinsb/53419f5d51785321b16f924d43766350/external/go1.8.3.linux-amd64 \
  /bin/bash -c 'set -e
export GOPATH=/tmp/gopath
export GO_WORKSPACE=${GOPATH}/src/k8s.io/kubernetes
mkdir -p ${GO_WORKSPACE%/*}
ln -s $(pwd)/ ${GO_WORKSPACE}
if [[ ! -e ${GO_WORKSPACE}/external ]]; then ln -s $(pwd)/external/ ${GO_WORKSPACE}/; fi
if [[ ! -e ${GO_WORKSPACE}/bazel-out ]]; then ln -s $(pwd)/bazel-out/ ${GO_WORKSPACE}/; fi
export GENGOPATH=/tmp/gengopath
export GENGO_WORKSPACE=${GENGOPATH}/src/k8s.io/kubernetes
mkdir -p ${GENGO_WORKSPACE%/*}
ln -s $(pwd)/bazel-out/local-fastbuild/genfiles ${GENGO_WORKSPACE}
export GOPATH=${GOPATH}:${GENGOPATH}
cd ${GO_WORKSPACE}
bazel-out/host/bin/vendor/k8s.io/kube-gen/cmd/set-gen/set-gen     --input-dirs ./vendor/k8s.io/apimachinery/pkg/util/sets/types     --output-base $(dirname $(dirname bazel-out/local-fastbuild/genfiles/vendor/k8s.io/apimachinery/pkg/util/sets/byte.go))     --go-header-file hack/boilerplate/boilerplate.go.txt     --output-package sets')

Use --sandbox_debug to see verbose messages from the sandbox.
ln: failed to create symbolic link '/tmp/gopath/src/k8s.io/kubernetes': File exists
Use --strategy=GoGenrule=standalone to disable sandboxing for the failing actions.
INFO: Elapsed time: 3.383s, Critical Path: 0.65s
Makefile:527: recipe for target 'bazel-build' failed
make: *** [bazel-build] Error 1
```


Bazel version 0.5.2:
```
Build label: 0.5.2
Build target: bazel-out/local-fastbuild/bin/src/main/java/com/google/devtools/build/lib/bazel/BazelServer_deploy.jar
Build time: Tue Jun 27 13:27:03 2017 (1498570023)
Build timestamp: 1498570023
Build timestamp as int: 1498570023
```

cc @kubernetes/sig-release-bugs

labels.description: Categorizes an issue or PR as relevant to SIG Release.
labels.name: sig/release

title: make bazel-build fails with `ln: failed to create symbolic link '/tmp/gopath/src/k8s.io/kubernetes': File exists`
